name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Fusion**

The Footprints Festival 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 11 artists from 10 different countries, showcasing a rich tapestry of global sounds and genres. From Malian desert blues to traditional Iranian melodies, Anatolian rock, and Afrobeat, the festival embodies a celebration of cultural diversity and musical innovation. With genres spanning electronic, psychedelic, jazz, indie pop, and experimental music, the festival promises a sonic journey that transcends borders and defies categorization.

Diversity shines not only in the music but also in the artists themselves. Seven of the performers identify as people of color, and the lineup includes both male and female artists, as well as mixed-gender groups, reflecting a commitment to inclusivity. The festival also highlights Germany’s vibrant music scene, with four acts hailing from the country, alongside talents from the UK, Brazil, Turkey, and beyond, ensuring a truly international experience.

With an impressive average rating of 7.73 and a strong presence of critically acclaimed acts (eight rated 8 or higher), Footprints Festival 2026 is poised to deliver a high-caliber experience. All artists are discoverable on Spotify, making it easy for attendees to explore their music ahead of the event. Whether you’re drawn to the soulful strains of gospel or the hypnotic beats of minimalist electropop, this festival offers a unique opportunity to connect with the shared language of music.
